description A stack ID or slug

required True

description A site ID

required True

description A scope ID

required True

required False

schema
type string
name disabletransparentmode
description Whether or not to load hostnames from a CDN sites CDN scope or its WAF scope When true this call loads scope hostnames from a CDN sites scope instead of loading from a CDN sites WAF scope if the site has WAF service
in query
required False
schema
type boolean
format boolean
summary Get all scope hostnames
description Hostnames allow the CDN to recognize an HTTP request and associate it with a CDN site

200
